column4: Does anyone know if there's a d-link irc channel? wifi drops every time a computer on the network shuts down.
LOL, you both asked eachother the same question at the same time XD
you sure you got the right password? (disclaimer, i have no knowledge of how home folders are encrypted in ubuntu)
does banshee recognize that it's an iPod, even if ubuntu doesn't?
That shouldn't matter as it just worked. Nano 4G.
ubuntu recognizes it as a mass storage device, then?
I had to manually mount it.
after you mount it, can you see your music?
The only reason I have to believe that it works at all is that I can ls /media/henry (my iPod's mountpoint) and see iPod_Control and stuff.
do you have another computer, possibly with another OS to try it on?
did you install/uninstall/update anything between when you could access your ipod and now?
Resetting my iPod fixed it, it seems.
